response.overview: The latest cinemacore thrill ride from LFl. With acclaimed actor/director Seth Gamble and visionary creator Siren Obscura at the helm, Enigma plunges viewers into a mysterious world of seduction and betrayal where forbidden lusts collide with dangerous truths. As passion and deception intertwine, obsession takes center stage, unraveling a dark, twisted game where no one is safe from the consequences of desire.
response.title: Enigma
